method.name: get_descriptor
method.description: The list of descriptors which indicate content within the product that may have triggered a particular age rating or may be of interest or concern to consumers, e.g., "Blood and Gore", "Intense Violence", etc.

method.name: get_interactive_element
method.description: The list of interactive elements, which advise consumers up front that a [MetaPlatformSDK_Product] includes interactive or online behaviors/options that may be of interest or concern, e.g., "In-App Purchases".

members.member: URI for the image that needs to be shown for the content rating of the [MetaPlatformSDK_Product].
The age rating text is the text version of the rating used to describe age appropriateness by the International Age Rating Coalition (IARC).
The URI pointing to a website with International Age Rating Coalition (IARC) rating definitions from local rating authorities (e.g., Australian Classification Board, ESRB, GRAC, etc).
